trans-unit.source: Represents a significant event in the lifetime of an application.
trans-unit.target: 表示应用程序的生存期中重要的事件。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 运行状况监视，用于管理已部署的 Web 应用程序的生产和操作人员。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management> namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management>命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况状态数据和负责处理此数据提供程序类型的运行状况事件类型。

trans-unit.source: It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events.
trans-unit.target: 它还包含在管理运行状况事件期间帮助的支持类型。

trans-unit.source: Application lifetime events include events such as application startup and shutdown events.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序生命周期事件包括事件，例如应用程序启动和关闭事件。

trans-unit.source: If an application is terminated, you can determine why by viewing the related event message field.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序将被终止，则可以通过查看相关的事件消息字段来确定原因。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> instance occurs, ASP.NET health monitoring updates the Application Lifetime Events performance counter.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>实例发生，ASP.NET 运行状况监视更新应用程序生存期 Events 性能计数器。

trans-unit.source: You can log these events by adding the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> object to the `rules` subsection of the `healthMonitoring` section of the configuration file, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过添加记录这些事件<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>对象传递给`rules`的小节`healthMonitoring`配置文件，如下面的示例中所示的部分。

trans-unit.source: The Application Lifetime Events performance counter contains the sum total of all ASP.NET lifetime events.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序生命周期事件性能计数器均包含所有 ASP.NET 生命周期事件的总计。

trans-unit.source: To view this performance counter in System Monitor (PerfMon), in the **Add Counters** window select **ASP.NET** from the **Performance object** drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看在系统监视器 (PerfMon)，此性能计数器中**添加计数器**窗口中选择**ASP.NET**从**性能对象**下拉列表。

trans-unit.source: Select the **Application Lifetime Events** performance counter, and click the **Add** button.
trans-unit.target: 选择**应用程序生命周期事件**性能计数器，并单击**添加**按钮。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see "Using the System Monitor (PerfMon) with ASP.NET Applications" on [MSDN](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅上的"使用系统监视器 (PerfMon) 与 ASP.NET 应用程序" [MSDN](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)。

trans-unit.source: If you allow events to be logged by the standard <xref:System.Web.Management.EventLogWebEventProvider>, you can view them in Event Viewer by selecting the **Application** log.
trans-unit.target: 如果你允许事件记录由标准<xref:System.Web.Management.EventLogWebEventProvider>，你可以查看它们在事件查看器通过选择**应用程序**日志。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Event Viewer](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=24845&clcid=0x409) in the Windows Server 2003 documentation on TechNet.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[事件查看器](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=24845&clcid=0x409)TechNet 上的 Windows Server 2003 文档中。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> object is a high-volume event, logging it is resource-intensive and might slow down your system.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>对象是大量事件，记录它是资源密集型且可能会减慢你的系统。

trans-unit.source: It can also cause other events to be overwritten in the case of the <xref:System.Web.Management.EventLogWebEventProvider> class due to the high volume of events and the way the event logging works.
trans-unit.target: 它还可能会导致其他事件的情况下覆盖<xref:System.Web.Management.EventLogWebEventProvider>类因为数量过多事件和方法的事件日志记录的工作原理。

trans-unit.source: In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，你将是一种能够使用 ASP.NET 运行状况监视类型，因为实现，并且将通过指定中的值控制运行状况监视系统`healthMonitoring`配置节。

trans-unit.source: You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以从要创建你自己的自定义事件和提供程序的运行状况监视类型派生。

trans-unit.source: For an example of deriving from the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> class, see the example provided in this topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关示例的派生自<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>类，请参阅本主题中提供的示例。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to derive from the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> class to create a custom event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>类，以创建自定义事件。

trans-unit.source: The following configuration-file excerpt shows how to configure the `healthMonitoring` section of a configuration file to add the `SampleWebApplicationLifetimeEvent` code defined above to the ASP.NET health-monitoring system.
trans-unit.target: 下面的配置文件摘录演示如何配置`healthMonitoring`要添加的配置文件的部分`SampleWebApplicationLifetimeEvent`到 ASP.NET 运行状况监视系统上面定义的代码。

trans-unit.source: To add the event to the system, you must define the event by adding a new entry to the `eventMappings` section and map the event to a provider by adding a new entry to the `rules` section.
trans-unit.target: 若要向系统添加事件，必须定义该事件由添加到新的入口`eventMappings`部分并将事件映射到提供程序，通过添加到新的入口`rules`部分。

trans-unit.source: When formatting your custom event information for display, override the <see cref="M:System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent.FormatCustomEventDetails(System.Web.Management.WebEventFormatter)" /> method rather than the <see cref="Overload:System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent.ToString" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 在设置格式显示你自定义事件信息，重写<see cref="M:System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent.FormatCustomEventDetails(System.Web.Management.WebEventFormatter)" />方法而不是<see cref="Overload:System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent.ToString" />方法。

trans-unit.source: This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information.
trans-unit.target: 这将避免覆盖或篡改敏感的系统信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The message associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 与该事件关联的消息。

trans-unit.source: The object that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 作为事件源的对象。

trans-unit.source: The code associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 与该事件关联的代码。

trans-unit.source: When you implement a custom event, the event code must be greater than <see cref="F:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebExtendedBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 实现自定义事件时，事件代码必须大于 <see cref="F:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebExtendedBase" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent" /> class using the supplied parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用所提供的参数初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent" /> 类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 运行状况监视系统在内部使用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: You will never use it to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> class, but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class.
trans-unit.target: 你不应使用它来创建的实例<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>类，但在实现你自己从此类继承的事件类型时，可以调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent.%23ctor%2A> constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent.%23ctor%2A>构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: It is called by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 它由 ASP.NET 进行调用。

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent.%23ctor%2A> constructor when deriving from the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> class.
trans-unit.target: 你可以调用<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent.%23ctor%2A>构造函数从派生时<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent.%23ctor%2A> in an ASP.NET custom health event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent.%23ctor%2A>ASP.NET 自定义运行状况事件中。

trans-unit.source: This code example is mainly intended to show the correct syntax to use.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例主要用于显示要使用的正确语法。

trans-unit.source: The message associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 与该事件关联的消息。

trans-unit.source: The object that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 作为事件源的对象。

trans-unit.source: The code associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 与该事件关联的代码。

trans-unit.source: When you implement a custom event, the event code must be greater than <see cref="F:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebExtendedBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 实现自定义事件时，事件代码必须大于 <see cref="F:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebExtendedBase" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes" /> value that specifies the detailed identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定事件的详细标识符的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent" /> class using the supplied parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用所提供的参数初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent" /> 类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 运行状况监视系统在内部使用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: You will never use it to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> class, but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class.
trans-unit.target: 你不应使用它来创建的实例<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>类，但在实现你自己从此类继承的事件类型时，可以调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent.%23ctor%2A> constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent.%23ctor%2A>构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: It is called by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 它由 ASP.NET 进行调用。

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent.%23ctor%2A> constructor when deriving from the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> class.
trans-unit.target: 你可以调用<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent.%23ctor%2A>构造函数从派生时<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent.%23ctor%2A> in an ASP.NET custom health event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent.%23ctor%2A>ASP.NET 自定义运行状况事件中。

trans-unit.source: This code example is mainly intended to show the correct syntax to use.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例主要用于显示要使用的正确语法。

trans-unit.source: Used internally to increment performance counters.
trans-unit.target: 在内部使用，用于递增性能计数器。
